About

I'am Snow

An enthusiastic and energetic graduate, majoring in IT from Monash University. I am a passionate and self-motivated web designer and developer with hands-on experience in both front and back end. I have a true passion for writing readable, maintainable and reusable code with SOLID principle. I enjoy troubleshooting and challenging projects. I am excited to work with a professional team, eager to expand my skills and learn from an experienced team. I am an effective team player with good written and verbal skills. I will become a valued contributor as fast learner with analytical skills, a positive attitude, self-managing and responsible.

Skills

‣ Testing: Jest, Junit, Mocha, Cross-browser testing

‣ Design tools: Photoshop, Zeplin
‣ Methodology: Agile, SCRUM, TDD
‣ AWS: EC2, S3, Lambda
